amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the executive order relating to the stewardship of oceans, coasts, and the Great Lakes, including the National Ocean Policy developed pursuant to the executive order.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the executive order relating to the stewardship of oceans, coasts, and the Great Lakes, including the National Ocean Policy developed pursuant to the executive order.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A073) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A073) offered by Mr. Byrne.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A073) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
